basics.name: Alec Carruthers
basics.label: AI Scientist and Engineer
basics.summary: I am an AI researcher interested in open-endedness, reinforcement learning, computer vision, generative modeling, physics, and out-of-distribution generalization.

work.name: Massachusetts Institute of Technology - Lincoln Lab
work.summary: Developed and finetuned an 8B parameter medical Vision Language Model to enable tasks such as cancer classification and structured report generation. Designed a diffusion generative model to produce synthetic ultrasound images to improve downstream performance of an object detection model. Parallelized training of billion parameter models using Fully Sharded Data Parallel.

awards.title: Texas Venture Labs Champion
awards.summary: As part of a four person team, we developed an idea for a startup company that would sell authentic Indian sari's to bridesmaids in the US and won a competition when pitching this idea to a panel of investors, resulting in a $10,000 prize.

publications.name: The Assessment, Improvement, and Application of the GeoFlood Flood Inundation Mapping Frameworks
publications.summary: Development of a computer vision and machine learning framework to convert raw, satellite lidar image data into flood inundation forecasts / maps across eight counties in Texas
